title: Patriots will be down key defensive starter for AFC Championship; Mack Hollins, Carlton Davis questionable
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots might only be down one starter for Sunday's AFC title game.
Harold Landry led the Patriots in sacks during the regular season.

(AP Photo/Charles Krupa) By Conor Roche January 23, 2026 | 3:04 PM 2 minutes to read The Patriots won’t be fully healthy for Sunday’s AFC title tilt against the Broncos, but they might only be short one starter when they head to Denver.

title: Providence man dies after assault by group of 11- and 12-year-olds
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Crime Four juveniles now face charges in connection with the Jan.
19 attack that killed Romy Alfonso, 51.
Providence Police say a 51-year-old man died of his injuries after he was attacked by four juveniles in an incident on Monday evening in Providence.

title: Prosecutors say Plymouth woman staged cancer diagnosis and her own death to skip court
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News An investigation found that Wilson forged healthcare, hospice, and funeral home documents — plus a death certificate — to avoid court hearings.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Prosecutors are accusing a Plymouth woman of faking a terminal cancer diagnosis — and even her own death — to dodge a series of court hearings, according to the Plymouth District Attorney’s office.
